CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): A.2.1.2a, reporterorganization (60AN)
E2B (R3): C.2.r.2.1 Reporter’s Organisation User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's organisation’s name. Conformance: Optional Data Type: 60AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text, nullFlavor: MSK, ASKU, NASK Entity Name: name
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's organization’s name.
CustomField.label: Organization
